function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of samples during drone transportation","Impact":"Inaccurate test results, spread of disease","Mitigation":"Use of secure sample containers, regular disinfection of the drone","Technologies":"Secure sample containers, drone disinfection systems","People":"Population in remote areas, healthcare workers","Owner":"Drone operators, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate public engagement for supply requirements","Impact":"Inefficient delivery of essential goods, increased public unrest","Mitigation":"Developing a seamless communication system, involving community leaders in the process","Technologies":"Communication platforms, community engagement tools","People":"General public in highly infected areas, local community leaders","Owner":"Local authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Misuse of surveillance drones leading to privacy concerns","Impact":"Violation of privacy rights, public distrust of authorities","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations on drone surveillance, educate the public on the purpose of surveillance","Technologies":"Privacy protection algorithms, public education campaigns","People":"General public, authorities conducting surveillance","Owner":"Government agencies, public advocacy groups"}]}
